Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.
Generation VIII.Shield: They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery is guaranteed success and good fortune.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The more sweet aromas it absorbs, the more its body swells. Milcery will deflate when its energy level drops.
Generation IX.Violet: When attacked, it tackles its foe and covers them in cream. With its foe either blinded or astonished by deliciousness, Milcery flees.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 4 , Bridge Field , Giant's Mirror Bridge Field , Lake of Outrage ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 4 , Bridge Field , Giant's Mirror Bridge Field , Lake of Outrage ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Chargestone Cavern , Polar Biome Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
